title: Diamond Mangalsutra - Delicate Thali Bottu Design
materials: Black Beads. Rose Gold finish for a subtle
elegant sheen. Hyderabadi craftsmanship ensures enduring quality.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Mangalsutra (Thali Bottu). Features delicate floral or kalash-shaped pendants intricately set with sparkling CZ diamonds, evenly spaced along a strand of classic black beads. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear. Combines the traditional black beads with a modern diamond pendant design.
occasions: weddings (especially pre-wedding events like Haldi or Mehendi)
or as a meaningful gift for a loved one. Suitable for both traditional and modern attire.
description: A symbol of love and commitment with a modern twist. Combines the sacred tradition of the Mangalsutra with contemporary elegance. The lightweight design ensures comfort for everyday wear. The CZ diamonds provide a brilliant sparkle without the high cost of natural diamonds. A versatile piece that can be worn with both Indian and Western outfits.
